title: Pointless Button- Android Wear
summary: The old Pointless Button apps are stuck in the past! Watches are the future!
description: This all-new pointless button app is for people with Android Wear devices. You can use it anywhere now; on-the-go, at school, at work, anywhere! Try it out and see how amazed you'll be at the pointlessness.
descriptionHTML: This all-new pointless button app is for people with Android Wear devices. You can use it anywhere now; on-the-go, at school, at work, anywhere! Try it out and see how amazed you'll be at the pointlessness.
comments: Best app since Lazer for wear! Absolutely flawless! Finally a pointless button that actually Works as advertised!  Makes a great watch face if u don't need to know the time or anything else for that matter.  My old favorite app just became my new old favorite app!  Sweet and sour all at the same time!  Odoyle rules!
Its just a button But okay
Installed  < uninstalled Was curious about this app. Wasted 2 minutes of my life downloading this app to find it doesn't work on moto 360
Completely pointless 10/10 literally had no use.
Best App Ever Made? Solid as a rock and works beautifully.
